Text: Welcome to VindigoDear cgerman Welcome to Vindigo Now you can hold the city in your hand We designed Vindigo to offer you a constantly updated set of the best restaurants shops movies and other entertainmentrelated activities in your area Simply tell Vindigo where you are and it will tell you where to find the best of everything Vindigo will even give you directions to help get you there And if youre feeling generous you can beam a copy of Vindigo to a friend Just tap Give on Vindigos home screen Getting Started For more information on how to use Vindigo please visit demo Getting Help If you need help installing or using Vindigo visit our help section help Vindigo Premier Content Partners austincom accessatlantacom bostoncom calendarlive on latimescom clubplanetcom inshopcoukcom nytodaycom seattletimescom sfgatecom startribunecom timeoutnycom This is London washingtonpostcom and zagatcom Thanks again for your support And remember to sync your handheld device every week to get the latest Vindigo content and features Sincerely The Vindigo Team To UNSUBSCRIBE from the Vindigo mailing list send an email to with your email address in the subject line
